name: Card holder
descp:
The Card holder is an everyday use accessory that you can carry with you at all times — be creative and use it as you want.
This vegan leather piece is available in 8 different colors.
Buy the Vegan leather kit and get 1 free Pouch.
Add 1 card holder, 1 pencil case, 1 roll-top backpack and 1 pouch to your cart and type VEGAN-LEATHER-KIT in the coupon field on the Cart page.
This coupon cannot be used on sale items or with other coupons.

name: Roll-top backpack
descp:
We designed the Roll-top backpack to let you carry around throughout the day your personal belongings, such as books, groceries, or a tablet. The vegan leather is resistant to water and super easy to clean, making the backpack long-lasting and always looking brand-new.
Buy the Vegan leather kit and get 1 free Pouch.
Add 1 card holder, 1 pencil case, 1 roll-top backpack and 1 pouch to your cart and type VEGAN-LEATHER-KIT in the coupon field on the Cart page.
This coupon cannot be used on sale items or with other coupons.

name: Essential circle scarf
descp:
The Essential circle scarf in organic cotton is the perfect piece to stay warm all-year-round. This fabric makes it super soft to the touch and gentle on your skin.

Also available in mustard.

name: Pouch
descp:
Your everyday & travel organiser.
This Pouch in vegan leather is made to be used on a daily basis and to keep everything tidy inside your bag or in your pocket. It is the perfect travel organizer — designed to fit your passport as well. The water-resistant material is easy to care and makes the pouch stand regular everyday use.
Buy the Vegan leather kit and get 1 free Pouch.

name: Squared minimalist belt
descp:
This new wider version of the minimalist belt brings functionality and lightness to the max. Its practical closing system, with a new rectangular ring closure, makes it super easy to adjust and fit a larger array of sizes.

Thanks to the lightweight material, this belt will hold your trousers without you even noticing while giving you a complete look.
As part of the Made-to-order collection, this piece is going to be made for you in our atelier in Lisbon, Portugal, right after your order placement.

name: Everywhere cap
descp:
The Everywhere cap is a six-panel with “Everywhere” embroidered at the center. Made with a high-quality technical fabric, which is sun and fade resistant, water repellent and breathable, making it perfect to wear on all your activities – from sports to leisure.
Similar version available in light grey.

name: Deconstructed sweatshirt
descp:
The Deconstructed sweatshirt has a relaxed fit that flows over the body. The brushed organic cotton makes it comfortable and soft to the touch. This distinctive piece features minimal details like a deconstructed neck and low shoulders.

Wear it on its own or over one Essential t-shirt.
Also available in mustard.
Buy the Sweatshirts kit and get 20% off.
Add 2 Sweatshirts to your cart and type SWEATSHIRTS-KIT in the coupon field at checkout.
This coupon cannot be used on sale items or with other coupons.

name: Piqué t-shirt
descp:
Our Piqué t-shirt has a soft texture and a brushed finishing that make it comfortable and easy to be worn all day long. It is made in Portugal with organic cotton, which enhances its durability and allows for a more sustainable t-shirt.

Also available in green melange and black melange.
Buy the T-shirts kit and get 20% off.
Add 3 T-shirts to your cart and type TSHIRTS-KIT in the coupon field at checkout.
This coupon cannot be used on sale items or with other coupons.

name: Drawstring trousers
descp:
The Drawstring trousers have an elastic waistband with adjustable cords. They fit loose through the hips and thighs with a slight taper towards the ankle. Made in Portugal, with a midweight cotton fabric for enhanced durability.

Pair them with the Essential sweatshirt or the Everyday t-shirt in warm white.

name: Piqué long sleeve
descp:
The Piqué long sleeve is a comfortable all-season essential. It is made in Portugal with 100% brushed organic cotton, soft to the touch and more sustainable for the environment.

To wear it all year round, pair it with one of our outerwear pieces, like the Denim jacket.
Also available in black melange.

name: Graphic piqué long sleeve
descp:
We are obsessed with minimal details and clean design. Our organic cotton long sleeve gets a bold graphic look in this updated piqué model. Same quality, same sustainable fiber, new timeless aesthetic.

As part of the Made-to-order collection, this piece is going to be made for you in our atelier in Lisbon, Portugal, right after your order placement.

name: Pencil case
descp:

name: Drawstring trousers
descp:
The Drawstring trousers have an elastic waistband with adjustable cords. They fit loose through the hips and thighs with a slight taper towards the ankle. Made in Portugal, with a midweight cotton fabric for enhanced durability.

Wear them with the Essential t-shirt in black or the Piqué long sleeve in black melange.

name: Relaxed long sleeve
descp:
The relaxed long sleeve shirt is one of the most functional pieces of this collection. The perfect piece for every occasion since it can either be worn to elevate your outfit of the day or as a pyjama top. This long sleeve sweater takes comfort to the next level given its loose fit and outer tag.

Match it with our Relaxed jersey pants for the colder months or with the Relaxed shorts for the warmer months. Also available in blue.

As part of the Made-to-order collection, this piece is going to be made for you in our atelier in Lisbon, Portugal, right after your order placement.

name: Denim jacket
descp:
The warm white Denim jacket is born from the convergence of two different pieces: the blazer and the jacket.
Inspired by utilitarian workwear, it can take you from chilly summer nights to cold winter days.

name: Minimal home slippers
descp:
We are happy to introduce you to our brand new home slippers, one of the most essential footwear items. With an easy slip-on design and a durable and slip-resistant outsole made from recycled leather.

Using excess cotton fabric from previous collections, we are able to decrease waste while guaranteeing breathability and high-quality material. Relaxed fit that comes in 3 different sizes according to your preference.

Our slippers run true to size and are designed for maximum comfort. To ensure a good fit, we recommend ordering the size you normally wear, bearing in mind the type of socks you plan to wear with them. If you are usually in between sizes, consider sizing up to one size.

name: Piqué track pants
descp:
These track pants are the perfect piece to wear on days you want to feel both comfortable and composed. Elastic waistband trousers with an interior drawstring and side pockets, cut for a relaxed straight fit that will help you keep this effortless look.

Maintaining the comfort of a regular pair of track pants while making them more versatile and elegant.

name: Five-panel cap
descp:
Designed as a more relaxed option to the six-panel, the five-panel cap is a modern and minimalist take on headwear. Our caps are made with a high-quality technical fabric, which is sun and fade resistant, water repellent and breathable, making it perfect to wear on all your activities – from sports to leisure.
Check also the other caps.

name: Drawstring trousers
descp:
The Drawstring trousers have an elastic waistband with adjustable cords. Inspired by workwear, these trousers have a relaxed comfortable fit. Made in Portugal, with a crisp mid-weight cotton canvas for enhanced durability.

Pair them with the Essential t-shirt in warm white or the Essential sweatshirt in black.

name: Recycled weekender tote bag
descp:
The Recycled weekender tote bag is the ultimate long-lasting staple for everyday use and traveling. Made from recycled marine plastic, this weekender tote bag was tailored to be extra durable and to keep all your gear safe.

It has space for all of life’s essentials and can be carried on your shoulder thanks to its wide straps.

Zippered main compartment with an inside and outside pocket perfect to keep your belongings at hand. This bag also features a functional side strap for warmer days when you just want to take your jacket off and not carry it around by hand.

name: Piqué sweatshirt

name: Piqué harrington jacket
descp:
Our new outerwear piece is a reinterpretation of a sporty Harrington jacket. Its premium fabric gives it a twist to a more composed and solid look, perfect to wear either outside or at the comfort of your home. Regular fit that englobes in one jacket a comfortable and structured demeanor thanks to the pointed collar.

Designed to make it easy to style with our Essential t-shirt for warmer days, and our Graphic piqué long sleeve for colder ones.

name: Piqué beanie hat
descp: Our new headwear piece is a reinterpretation of the classic beanie hat. Its compact size gives a round and fitted shape. Perfect for the colder days and made in wetheknot signature fabric, organic cotton. Pair it with the Essential circle scarf in black.
